Name: Sweet Science
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 1981 by Charles Schumann in Munich, Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Sweet Science contains 167 calories
